transcript:
Customer: Hello kaun?
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Haan ji sir, namaskar. Main Sujash Dubey baat kar raha Shraddha ki team se. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ji, main achha hoon. Aap aap sir, aap theek hain?
Executive: Bahut badhiya, bahut badhiya sir. Sir actually Shraddha ne mujhe bataya ki aapko services use karne mein thodi si problem ho rahi hai. To iske regarding main aapke saath ek meeting karna chah raha tha ki kya exactly problem ho rahi hai aur kaise hum aapko help kar payenge business dilane mein. Right?
Customer: Nahi. Shraddha mam se kal to mera baat hua. Wo phone kiye the. Shaam mein. Unko bola abhi to sab system mein ready ho gaya. Phone, phone, WhatsApp, aapka jo computer wahan se aapko jankari mil jata hai. Kaise kaise kahan pe click karne kaise aapko service milega wo to wo to baat sahi hai. Lekin hum unko bolna chahte hain.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Hamara na unko unhone se unhone se yahi baat baati hua. Hamara Trade India mein ek add chal raha hai. Theek hai? Ki contact se.
Executive: Okay, okay.
Customer: To yahan jo Trade India wale jo log hain na wo mahine mein ek baar, do baar hamara factory mein visit karta hai. Kabhi wo hamara jo near jo office hai jo hamara Kolkata Burrabazar. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan. Wahan pe wahan pe meet karte hain. Theek hai sabhi to baat phone mein hi ho jata hai, system mein ho jata hai. Theek hai lekin kya hoga ek baar visit karne se impression achha hoga. Ye hamara India mein. Wahi wahi Trade India wale log jo hai wo kabhi kabhi aa jata hai. Mahine mein do ek baar, do mahine ke baad ek baar aa jata hai. Jaise wo hamara ek madam hai wo deal kar raha hai. Lekin wahi hum bolna chahte hain.
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Ji ji. Main samajh gaya sir aapki baat. Actually aap chahte hain ki field visit agar ho jaye mahine mein ek ya do baar to aapke liye thoda sa easy rahega. Right?
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Business understanding ke liye. Aapka to aapka to IndiaMART ka jo office Kolkata mein hai. To wahan se ek baar ek baar visit karne se hamara jo wahan pe office hai near jo office wahan se visit karne se wahan hamara pitaji rehta tha wahan pe baithe aur hamara jo ek uncle tha wo wo wo baithe kabhi kabhi baithe aur ek manager bhi tha wo kabhi kabhi baithe. To kya hai milne se matlab achha hoga. Haan. Wahi hum bolte hain. Wahi bolte hain.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Idhar idhar idhar aapka jo Sarthak babu hai na Sarthak babu idhar. Wo aadmi wo aadmi achha hai. Wo hamara jab IndiaMART jab chalu kiya tha wo yahan pe aaya tha. Mera pitaji se baat hua tha. Uske saath Chakraborty ka Choudhary bolke ek ladka tha unka title hai. Wo aaya tha dono visit kar aaya tha. Pehle jab jab shuru kiya tha. To April mein 2025 April mein. To kya hoga aapka ye visit karne se hamara jo actual ke partnership business hai na to partner ka alag alag view hota hai. Wo kyun nahi hamara idhar nahi aate. Wo nahi aate to hamara Kolkata office mein ek baar to saptah mein mahine mein ek baar do baar visit karta hai. Wo to Burrabazar to regularly wo log aata hai. To isliye hum wahi hum bolna chahte hain.
Executive: I understand sir. Main samajh gaya ye cheeze ki aapko thoda sa agar physical visit hoga to aapke liye thoda sa easy rahega. But actually hota ye hai sir ki jo hamari basic service rehti hai, basic services jo aap abhi use kar rahe hain, usme thoda sa hame mushkil hota hai ki hum field koi assign kar paye aapke liye field service person. Baki hamare sales ke person rehte hain. Agar aapko koi koi aisa lagta hai jis bhi month mein, waise to hum sir 24 into 7 aapke liye available hain. Aap jab bhi bhi phone karenge right Saturday Sunday hamara office band rehta hai. Aap jab bhi baki hame phone karenge right hum available hain aapko proper service provide karane ke liye. But fir bhi sir agar aapko aisa lagta hai ki kisi bhi time agar mujhe field ka hi koi ek banda chahiye jo mujhe help kar payega to main ek baar apne senior se ek baar discuss karta hoon. Koi agar person assign ho sakta hoga aapke aas paas ya aapke aas paas ke location mein koi banda hota hoga IndiaMART ka jo service deta hoga to hum definitely aapke liye bhi karwa denge. But sir koi aisa commitment nahi kar sakta main aapko ki nahi nahi sir hum aapko provide kara hi denge. Koshish karte hain sir agar aapko hamari taraf se kuch services mein pasand nahi aata hai ya aapko humse dikkat hoti hai aapko chahiye hi chahiye to then us case mein hum aage wo cheeze apne senior ke samne escalate karenge unko bata payenge. Right? To pehli cheez sir ye hai right ki abhi aapko Shraddha ne bataya hoga ki aapko na main proper ek video meeting karna chah raha tha. Ye video meeting aap jitni baar kahenge mahine mein hum utni baar aapke liye assign kar denge taki aapko bahut easy tarike se services ke samajh mein aa jaye aur koi confusion na rahe service ke liye. To aap jab bhi free raha kariye ya to mere number pe call kar dijiye ya to aap Shraddha ko call kar lijiye. Hum aapko proper service dene ke liye baithe hue hain sir. To dusri cheez ye hai sir ki ji. Maine na aapki jo registered mail ID hai sir usme ek video meeting link share kiya hai. Dekhiye aapke paas mein receive hua kya? To ek baar hum log aamne samne baith payenge.
Customer: Hamara mail mein dala hai na?
Executive: Haan ji aapki mail mein maine dala. Hawra lock@yahoo.com.
Customer: Sir ye kya hoga video meeting hoga?
Executive: Ye exactly video meeting hoga sir.
Customer: Lekin video meeting suniye na video meeting jo webcam hai na jo system ka webcam.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: To webcam to nahi hai isliye hum koi baat nahi koi baat nahi koi baat nahi sir koi issue nahi hai usme. Achha achha achha okay ek baar login karne ka samay dijiye sir.
Executive: Haan ji. Aap login kar lijiye sir.
Customer: Main line mein hi hoon.
Customer: Hello sir.
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: Sir abhi tak to mail to nahi idhar koi nahi pa raha hoon abhi tak.
Executive: Okay. Mail abhi aapke paas mein nahi aaya. Invitation with IndiaMART team karke mail aayega sir Sujash Dubey ke naam se. Aapki jo registered email ID hai jo aapne IndiaMART mein hame provide karai hai wo hawralock@yahoo.com hai.
Customer: Haan haan sir. Hawralock@yahoo.com wahi hai wahi hai.
Executive: Ji check kijiyega sir ek baar zara inbox check kijiyega.
Customer: Inbox mein?
Executive: Haan ji inbox check kijiyega ek baar.
Customer: Hmm inbox to hum click kar rahe hain koi abhi tak to nahi idhar nahi pa raha hoon.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Abhi tak to koi mail aapke paas mein nahi aaya hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi aaya nahi aaya.
Executive: Okay okay. Sir main ek kaam kar raha hoon main right Shraddha se ek baar bol kar ke aapka Shraddha ka number aapke phone mein save hai?
Customer: Haan haan haan hai hai sir.
Executive: Haan theek hai main Shraddha se bol kar ke ek baar aapko video meeting link share kara raha hoon. Mujhe do minute ka time dijiyega main aapko call back kar raha hoon sir.
Customer: Ji ji sir.
Executive: Ji sir. Theek hai.
Executive: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants field visit from IndiaMART representatives.

- Unable to find the video meeting link in email.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the difficulty in assigning field person.

- Executive offered to discuss with seniors for field visit.

- Executive offered to schedule video meetings.

- Executive will ask Shraddha to share video meeting link.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after 2 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- field visit, video meeting, email, services
